thumb.name: Bouquet %26 Butterfly
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBarbara. if you get a lot of rest And you do the things you should. It won't be very long Before you're feeling good%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd since a loving thought Can work some magic. too. Here's a special heartfelt wish That you'll soon be good as new!

thumb.name: Better Every Day Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHi. Robin!%3Cbr%3EJust peeking in to say...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope you're getting better%3Cbr%3Ewith each and every day!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGet Well Soon
